articles.title: Zomato writes down investment in fintech arm; surrenders PA, wallet licence to RBI - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Zomato, via its fintech arm Zomato Payment, has surrendered its recently-secured online payment aggregator (PA) and prepaid payment instrument (PPI) licences to the Reserve Bank of India (RBI), the filings show.
articles.content:
Foodtech major Zomato wrote down Rs 39 crore investment in its fintech subsidiary Zomato Payment Private Limited (ZPPL) during the March quarter.

articles.author: Ekta Mourya
articles.title: Top AI tokens bleed despite reports of Apple closing deal to use OpenAI features - FXStreet
articles.description: Technology giant Apple Inc. has reportedly reached an agreement with Artificial Intelligence (AI) firm OpenAI to include the latter’s tech in the next iPhone.
articles.content:
• Apple has closed a deal with OpenAI to use the latter’s technology in its new iPhone, Bloomberg reports.
  • The giant’s iOS 18 could come packed with ChatGPT features, per the report.
